<PLDatabaseConnectionProvider> Protocol Reference

A protocol for opening new or existing PLDatabase connections, and returning those connections for re-use upon completion. More...

#import <PLDatabaseConnectionProvider.h>

Public Member Functions

(id< PLDatabase >) - getConnectionAndReturnError:
 Returns a database connection.
(void) - closeConnection:
 Called to return the given connection for re-use.

Detailed Description

A protocol for opening new or existing PLDatabase connections, and returning those connections for re-use upon completion.

Member Function Documentation

- (id<PLDatabase>) getConnectionAndReturnError: (NSError **)  error  

Returns a database connection.

Parameters:
error A pointer to an NSError object variable. If an error occurs, this pointer will contain an error object indicating why the transaction could not be started.
Returns:
A database connection, or nil on error.
